### Coursera

I am an advocate of [massive open online courses (MOOCs)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massive_open_online_course), and in particular, I have had many great experiences with [Coursera](https://www.coursera.org/). Below are some of the projects I've done as part of those courses:

**Data Science Specialization (Johns Hopkins University)**

* **[Regression Models](https://s3.amazonaws.com/coursera-uploads/user-c6cf595c99876d33669f141e/973762/asst-4/0d9ca7c0880211e4b2a3c70a976aa8ad.pdf)**
* **[Practical Machine Learning](http://dnegrey.github.io/PML_CourseProject/writeup.html)**
* **[Developing Data Products](https://dnegrey.shinyapps.io/courseProject/)**
* **[Reproducible Research](http://rpubs.com/dnegrey/45114)**
